GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v6.0.18
GSD.description:
ext4: disable fast-commit of encrypted dir operations

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit 0bdcac7469aa6f47eb19e1a9ba8fde822a96fd37, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit aa75f4d3daaeb1389b9cce9d6b84401eaf228d4e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: disable fast-commit of encrypted dir operations
OSV.details:
ext4: disable fast-commit of encrypted dir operations

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit 0bdcac7469aa6f47eb19e1a9ba8fde822a96fd37, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit aa75f4d3daaeb1389b9cce9d6b84401eaf228d4e. For more details please see the references link.
